text: Christoph Watrin (born 7 August 1988 in Cologne) is a German singer and musician. == Early Life == Chris was born in Cologne in 1988. He attended professional piano lessons when he was a child. == US5 == In 2005, he acted in a German TV show Big in America with his German bandmate, Michael. Fortunately, he joined US5 and making fame with them. == Career == He released Rot Gr√ºn Blau in 2012. In 2019, He reunited with bandmate Izzy to form Izzy & Chris. title: Christoph Watrin
